br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.abstracts

Class Advantage

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.limaogames.librpg.framework.abstracts.Advantage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvantageListener, java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Advantage
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdvantageListener, java.io.Serializable
    Model class to be inherited by advantages/disadvantages classes. The advantages/disadvantages are used on players to make them more realistic. Advantages can be acquired spending adventurer's creation points. It can be also purchased by other ways as spending money or experience. As you acquire it, your character becomes more difficult to be fainted. In other hand, you can purchase disadvantages. But as you buy something that will make your character vulnerable, you gets adventurer's creation points.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Limao Games
    Email: andreikeda@limaogames.com.br
    created on: 06/02/2014
    See Also:
    AdvantageListener, Serializable, Serialized Form

        public void create(long id,
          java.lang.String name,
          java.lang.String description,
          int[] increment,
          int cost,
          Advantage.Type type)
        Description copied from interface: AdvantageListener
        Creates a instance of Advantage.
        Specified by:
        create in interface AdvantageListener
        Parameters:
        id - - object's identifier.
        name - - object's name. It can be null, but it's not recommended.
        description - - object's description. It can be null.
        increment - - amount of increment that will be sum to attributes. See Attribute.Type to index the param.
        cost - - object's cost to be added on Adventurer.
        type - - variable to set if it's advantage or disadvantage.
